summary.span: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.

span.span: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除從視覺化樹狀結構中移除項目容器時，附加屬性。 clears the attached property when the item container is removed from the visual tree. 這是讓項目容器可以正常運作時使用容器回收功能。This is done so item containers behave correctly when the uses container recycling. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和 「 容器回收"中[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see and "Container Recycling" in [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a should keep the synchronized with the current item in the property.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a should keep the synchronized with the current item in the property.

value.span: 如果一律與中目前的項目同步處理;如果永遠不會同步處理目前的項目。如果與目前的項目只有當同步處理使用。

span.span: if the is always synchronized with the current item in the ; if the is never synchronized with the current item; if the is synchronized with the current item only if the uses a .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性`true`以確保一律選取的項目對應至屬性。You can set the property to `true` to ensure that the item selected always corresponds to the property in the . 例如，假設有兩個與控制其屬性設定為相同的來源。For example, suppose that there are two controls with their property set to the same source. 設定至`true`這兩個清單方塊，以確保在每個選取的項目上相同。Set to `true` on both list boxes to ensure that the selected item in each is the same. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會將兩個至相同的控制項。The following example binds two controls to the same . 因為設`true`每，選取的項目一定是相同的兩種控制項Because is set to `true` on each , the selected item is always the same for both controls [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#4)]

.property instance int32 SelectedIndex
Public Property SelectedIndex As Integer
public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.

value.span: 目前的選取範圍中的第一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of first item in the current selection.
The default value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援選取單一項目，屬性會傳回選取之項目的索引。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the index of the selected item. 如果支援多重選取，傳回使用者第一次選取的項目索引。If a supports multiple selections, returns the index of the item that the user selected first. 設定中，支援多個選取項目清除現有的選取項目並設定選取範圍索引所指定的項目。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified by the index. 如果選取項目是空的則傳回-1。 returns -1 if selection is empty. 如果您設定的值小於該-1，就會擲回。If you set to a value less that -1, an is thrown. 如果您設定為值的項目子系數目大於或等於，值會被忽略。If you set to a value equal or greater than the number of child elements, the value is ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定屬性設為 1，其會選取中的第二個項目。The following example creates a and sets the property to 1, which selects the second item in the . [!code-xaml[ListBoxItems_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] 下列範例會使用屬性來決定索引 0 處的項目是否為選取範圍中的第一個項目。The following example uses the property to determine whether the item at index 0 is the first item in the selection. [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselectedindex)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselectedindex)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援選取單一項目，屬性會傳回選取的項目。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the selected item. 如果支援多重選取，傳回使用者第一次選取的項目。If a supports multiple selections, returns the item that the user selected first. 設定中，支援多個選取項目清除現有的選取項目，並將選取項目設定為指定的項目。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會取得從。The following example gets the from a . The value of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷值的屬性路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 設定X 嘗試選取的項目，其值會評估為 X 的值; 如果找不到任何這類項目，會清除選取項目。Setting to a value X attempts to select an item whose value evaluates to X; if no such item can be found, the selection is cleared. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合的`Employee`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 範例會設定至`@EmployeeNumber`和至`12345`。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 這會選取`Employee`具有`12345`做為值`EmployeeNumber`。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此範例也會繫結至的。This example also binds a to the of the . 當使用者變更選取範圍中的、會更新以顯示目前選取之員工的員工數目。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

[!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: Occurs when the selection of a changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取項目變更時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs whenever there is a change to a selection. 使用者互動所不僅也可以繫結，以及其他設定值，可以變更選取範圍。A selection can be changed not only by user interaction but also by binding as well as other set values. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加清單方塊控制項的事件。The following example shows how to attach the event to a list box control. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下列範例示範如何處理事件。The following example shows how to handle the event. [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
